Articles.Content:
So I decided to build an anomaly hunter. Then I decided it would look cooler as an AWACS.

Warning: product is not guarunteed to fly, drive, or stay in one piece.

On the runway, scanners deployed:

Shortly after the runway, after lithobraking to safety (it actually lithobrakes!):

Will provide .craft link if requested.

Celestial Industries, the Kerbal Space Program, the SPH, the KSC runway, and the planet Kerbin cannot be held responsible for the death of any kerbals during use of this product.
If it were a true anomaly detector, wouldn't it have something like ISA on it? Other than that, it looks very well.
Who said it actually performed advertised function? I know I didn't.
I was inferring that you did, besides wouldn't it fit? it is a mod craft, what not tell the truth?
